results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse promises the peace of God that goes beyond human comprehension.
results.reflection: God's peace protects our hearts and minds in times of turmoil.

results.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
results.reason: Jesus offers a peace unlike any the world can provide, reassuring us amidst fear.
results.reflection: Christ's peace calms our fears and steadies our hearts.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse highlights that trust in God brings perfect peace.
results.reflection: Fixing our thoughts on God anchors us in peace.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: The peace of Christ should govern our hearts, promoting unity and gratitude.
results.reflection: Christ's peace guides us towards thankfulness and harmony.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: God is the source of strength and peace for His people.
results.reflection: God's blessings include the gift of enduring peace.
